synopsis.text: One day, while cleaning the pool as punishment, the socially awkward, anime and video game-obsessed high school senior, Hikari Tsutsui, meets the beautiful and bold Iroha Igarashi. Known for her brash behavior and popularity with boys, Iroha is initially everything Hikari dislikes in real-life girls. Despite his initial reluctance, Iroha's unexpected kindness and willingness to stand up for him pique his interest. In a surprising turn of events, Iroha proposes they start a relationship, but with the catch that she'll be moving away in six months. As Hikari embarks on this romantic journey, he must navigate the unfamiliar waters of a real-life relationship and confront his own prejudices about people. Will Hikari be able to handle his first "3D girlfriend" and the challenges that come with it? Join him in this heartwarming and hilarious comedy that explores love, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
